app_level_enrichment.free_tier_limitations: 50 free searches per month
app_level_enrichment.notes: Zenserp is a SERP API for Google search results. Free tier includes 50 searches/month. Paid plans: Developer $29/month (5,000 searches), Business $79/month (25,000 searches), Enterprise $199/month (100,000 searches). All plans include full API access.

partnerships_issues.description: API quota or rate limit has been exceeded for the current billing period, preventing verification of code changes

enrichment.solution: Review error details and contact zenserp support if needed

app_level_enrichment.free_tier_limitations: 100 free email validations per month
app_level_enrichment.notes: ZeroBounce email validation API offers pay-as-you-go credits. Free tier: 100 validations/month. Pricing tiers: 2,000 credits for $16, 5,000 for $39, 10,000 for $65, up to enterprise volumes. API access included in all tiers including free.

partnerships_issues.description: Test account lacks sufficient credits or plan tier to execute operations

enrichment.solution: Purchase additional API credits

partnerships_issues.description: API endpoints blocked by Cloudflare with 403 Access Denied errors, likely due to IP restrictions, geo-blocking, or special access requirements

enrichment.solution: Review error details and contact zerobounce support if needed

app_level_enrichment.free_tier_limitations: Free plan limited to $50K USD annual revenue, 1 user, basic features
app_level_enrichment.notes: Zoho Books has a free plan for businesses under $50K annual revenue. API access is available on all plans including free. Paid plans: Standard $15/org/month, Professional $40/org/month, Premium $60/org/month, Elite $120/org/month. API rate limits vary by plan.

partnerships_issues.description: Zoho Books API credentials are invalid or expired.

enrichment.solution: Generate new API key from zoho_books dashboard

app_level_enrichment.free_tier_limitations: Free Basic plan has 40-minute meeting limit, API rate limits apply
app_level_enrichment.notes: Zoom API access is available on all plans including Free Basic. Developer API is free to use with rate limits. Zoom pricing: Free (Basic), Pro $15.99/user/month, Business $21.99/user/month, Enterprise (custom pricing). Some advanced API features may require paid plans or Zoom Developer Pro subscription.
